configClass.title: ConfigClass
configClass.description: Fully qualified configuration class name loaded as a Java bean configuration.

engine.title: Engine
engine.description: The test engine to use when running tests

includes.title: Includes
includes.description: Test name patterns that specify which tests to include in the test run. Used when scanning packages for tests.

items.title: Includes
items.description: Test name patterns that specify which tests to include in the test run. Used when scanning packages for tests.

packages.title: Packages
packages.description: List of package names to search for tests. All tests found in these packages are executed.

items.title: Packages
items.description: List of package names to search for tests. All tests found in these packages are executed.

port.title: Port
port.description: The Http port the agent service is listening on.

reset.title: Reset
reset.description: When enabled the Citrus context instance is reset after the test.

skipTests.title: SkipTests
skipTests.description: When enabled no tests are run on application startup.

systemExit.title: SystemExit
systemExit.description: When enabled the application exits with an exit code after tests are run.

testJar.title: TestJar
testJar.description: Set the test jar holding tests to execute. Jar file is used to perform package scans for test cases to run.

testSources.title: TestSources
testSources.description: List of test sources to run. A test source represents a source code file in one of the supported languages (.java, .xml, .groovy, .yaml, .feature)

items.title: TestSources
items.description: List of test sources to run. A test source represents a source code file in one of the supported languages (.java, .xml, .groovy, .yaml, .feature)

timeToLive.title: TimeToLive
timeToLive.description: Set time to live for the Citrus application. When set the application terminates automatically when time is over.

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: When enabled the test run prints verbose messages.

workDir.title: WorkDir
workDir.description: Set custom working directory. File system based test engines may use this directory to read files from.
